description: Roughly two-thirds of the Rohingya Muslims in Myanmar fled this year as soldiers shot them, raped them and torched their homes.
title: How the Rohingya Escaped
title_page: How the Rohingya Escaped - The New York Times
text:
Muhammed Shoeb woke in the middle of the night to the sound of gunshots getting closer and closer. A neighbor’s house suddenly caught flame. He scrambled to escape with his family.
His children asked, “Dad, what are we doing? Why are we doing this? Where are we going? What are we going to do?”
